posts.body: What's everyone listening to on Storytel this week? I just finished 'Harry Potter' for the 11th time and need something new :)
posts.author: JK.Rowling

posts.body: This forum is pretty cool but someone should have put more effort into the design!
posts.author: Rich Harris

comments.body: "Sapiens" by Yuval Noah Harari is pretty interesting! And I'm also listening to "A Moveable Feast" by Hemingway since I'm going to Paris on friday
comments.author: Nils

comments.body: Yes! Especially the login flow. I heared the security sucks too, but atleast they aren't storing their password in plain text
comments.author: JK.Rowling

comments.body: Glad you like it! I wish I could work fulltime on this, then I would've put more effort into the design, testing & security for sure, and maybe even rebuidling it in svelte. If you have more feedback or questions, please don't hesitate to get in touch with me: +46703360147, nils.goksor@gmail.com
comments.author: Nils
